title: Beverage Factory FP-CB05G Carboy, 1 Count (Pack of 1)
features: The Kegco 5 gallon glass carboy makes a great alternative option to a plastic carboy or bucket and is the perfect vessel for fermenting 4 or 5 gallon batches. The durable carboy is airtight and will not break down over time.

This carboy is constructed of glass ensuring that they do not easily scratch making cleaning and sanitizing much easier. If handled with care, the Kegco 5 gallon glass carboy can provide decades of great performance.
These carboys are made of glass and should be handled with extreme care, they are not impervious to thermal shock and can shatter when exposed to large, sudden changes in temperature.
Carboy includes nylon carrying straps for ease of transportation.
description: 5 gallon glass carboys are preferred over plastic buckets and plastic carboys for a multitude of reasons. They do not scratch easily, making them easy to sanitize and preventing them from holding odors After fermentation. They are airtight and do not break down over time so if you handle them with care, They can provide decades of great performance. Material: glass dimensions: 18.75"H x 10.5"W weight: 15 lbs
